feed.title: Scrypted Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.133.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • Battery cams api fixes (#1719) #1719 (apocaliss92)
  • Sleeping cameras should not wake for periodic snapshots (#1718) #1718 (apocaliss92)
  • 933c0ca: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • b3ce6a2: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • dfee7c6: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix unhandled rejection parsing camera object detection (Koushik Dutta)
  • update detection properties (Koushik Dutta)
  • hook cluster creation for electron (Koushik Dutta)
  • 6caafd7: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • fixup cluster worker hook (Koushik Dutta)
  • 7128af2: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
